page.title: 14LIFE STYLES
page.content: As Peacehaven boys we like to join in with the sports at school(Hoddern) and out of school.Out of school sports are football, cricket,tennis,golf and rounders.Most towns and villages run youth teams who take part in competitions.We enjoy our sport very much.Our local football team is called Peacehaven Pirates.Several of us belong to Rottingdean Cricket Club colts team. A Drama group is held on Saturday at the Youth Centre.First we do some relaxation then we do some mime and follow this with acting out various situations.We learn dramatic passages to speak and act. There is a Scout Troop which meets on a Friday.We have a Scout band which is made up of members of all the scouting and guiding organisations.
